attributes.action: Take accition to stop all MPs from owning propity in London as second homes
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The Government sould buy accomodation of big enough size to give accomodation to all serving MPs to use while staying in London
These should be along the size of a one bedroom flat with a living room and a small kitchen dinner and would all be of the same size and each MP would have one issued when they get voted in and as soon as they stop been an MP they are taken off them.
All decorations will be done by the Works Department together with all furnishings, if the MP wants somthig different the they must pay for it them selfs, These flats would all be rent free for the time that the MPs are in the job and no expences would be allowed for this.
But any MP will be able to have there own accomodation if they want to but it will be at there cost & no expences for this would be allowed.
All food would have a £20 per day limit and would have to be backed by reciepts, if no reciept then no expence paid.
If on Government buisness then there would be rooms available for entertaining and this would be done on a cost per head and would have to be pre booked and the Government would pick up the bill for it.
This would take away any possible abuse of the system.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
